name: elderberry
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small tree that grows wild or in gardens, with large flat groups of white flowers and small dark fruit that can be used in cooking or making wine: Riverside shrubs such as the elderberry act as filters for pollutants. Elderberry is a many-stemmed shrub with opposite, compound leaves.
Ashley Cooper/Corbis Documentary/GettyImages
the small, almost black fruit of an elderberry tree: The birds fed on blackberries or elderberries. elderberry wine
More examplesFewer examplesThe elderberry is a very old herbal plant indeed.The house was half concealed by elderberry and privet.Elderberries are very easy to pick.Elderberry juice is known to be rich in antioxidants.
